caption.p: Example of learning objectives for the CBL session

tr.td:
In relation to gastrointestinal toxicities and side effects,
ALL PROFESSIONALS (teachers, pedagogues, social workers, physiotherapists, all medical doctors, nurses and other professionals affiliated with your clinic) should be able to:
1. Identify one's own professional limitations and ask for help
2. Identify need for communication with the nurse and/or doctor in charge of patient
